select qi.seq_id , date_format(qi.register_date, '%Y/%m/%d') register_date , date_format(qi.update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date , err_text , delivery_sts , order_no , cart_no , delivery_company_q10 , invoice_no , ship_date , order_date , pay_date , delivery_date , ship_eta , delivery_atd , ship_method , item_no , product_name , qty , option_info , option_cd , bonus , recpt_name , recpt_name_kana , recpt_phone_no , recpt_mobile_no , address , post_no , country_name , ship_pay , pay_site , currency_type , pay_amt , sel_price , disc_price , total_price , total_supply , pay_name , pay_name_kana , delivery_item , pay_phone_no , pay_mobile_no , product_cd , jan_cd , std_no , presenter , ads_no_site , material_type from q10_info qi left outer join translation_err terr on terr.trans_target_id = qi.seq_id and terr.trans_target_type = 'Q'
qi.register_date between str_to_date(concat(#{register_date},' ','00:00:00'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S') and str_to_date(concat(#{register_date},' ','23:59:59'), '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%S')
and recpt_name like '%${recpt_name}%'
and order_no like '%${order_no}%'
and invoice_no like '%${invoice_no}%'

#{item}
and delivery_company = #{delivery_company}
qi.register_date between str_to_date(#{start_date}, '%Y/%m/%d %H:%i:%s') and now()
order by qi.pay_date desc
